chatApp.title: Real‑Time Chat App
chatApp.description: Interactive messaging platform with instant communication features.
features: JWT authentication for secure user login/logout
Typing indicators and read receipts for better UX
Persistent chat history stored in MongoDB
Group chat support with multiple participants
Responsive design for seamless mobile and desktop use
GSAP animations for smooth UI transitions

bmwSite.title: BMW Showcase Website
bmwSite.description: Custom-designed interactive car showcase with smooth scroll-triggered video playback.
features: Unique layout using semantic & grid-based divs with custom IDs for specs display
Scroll-controlled car video: sticky section until playback completes, then scroll resumes
Custom CSS animations and transitions (no GSAP) for engaging visual effects
No authentication/login—pure focus on browsing and design experience
Optimized asset loading with video and image lazy-loading techniques

foodOrder.title: College Food Order
foodOrder.description: Full‑stack platform for students & vendors with smooth GSAP animations.
features: Secure JWT login/signup for students & vendors
Vendor dashboard for CRUD & status updates
GSAP-powered animations for engaging UI transitions
Responsive, mobile‑first design with lazy loading
Efficient state management using React Context API
